price: 13. Il invoque celui qui est plus nuisible que favorable. Quel piètre allié et quel triste compère !
arabic: يَدۡعُواْ لَمَن ضَرُّهُۥٓ أَقۡرَبُ مِن نَّفۡعِهِۦۚ لَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡمَوۡلَىٰ وَلَبِئۡسَ ٱلۡعَشِيرُ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yadʿū laman ḍarruhu aqrabu min nafʿihi labi'sa al-mawlā walabi'sa al-ʿashīru
